summary: A depiction of the love/hate relationship between Queen Elizabeth I and Robert Devereux, the Earl of Essex.

Carroll|Guy Bellis|Forrester Harvey|Holmes Herbert|I. Stanford Jolley|Doris Lloyd|John Sutton|Rosella Towne|Maris Wrixon
keywords: queen|reference to shakespeare's richard ii|queen elizabeth i character|earl of essex character|francis bacon character
title: La vida privada de Elisabeth y Essex
